text: Maurits Maarten Alexander Jonkman, born 20 March 1986 in The Hague, South Holland, is a Dutch cricketer who has represented the Netherlands in first- class and One-Day International cricket. He is a right-arm fast bowler. His identical twin, Mark, also represents the Netherlands in cricket. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch cricketers Category:Netherlands One Day International cricketers Category:Sportspeople from The Hague Category:Twin people from the Netherlands Category:Identical twins Category:Twin sportspeople
title: Maurits Jonkman
